name: BLOODZONE
description:
WELCOME TO THE BLOODZONE Can you find the legendary floppy disk? You are Gnorbitt a madman at large! Sneak and fight your way through the secret bunker using your enemies weapons against them, to find the ultimate treasure. CONTROLS

WASD - MOVEMENT
MOUSE - LOOKAROUND
LEFT CLICK - SHOOT
SCROLLWHEEL = CHANGE WEAPON
SHIFT - SPRINT
CONTROL - CROUCH
SPACE - JUMP

CREDITS ART

Tom Redwood

DESIGN

Craig Brown, Danny Gardner

MUSIC

Enzo Satera

PROGRAMMING

Dylan Gilchrist, Stefan Lewis

Made for GJL Game Parade Spring 2021

Hello Games Jobs Live :)

We have submitted our most stable version of our project although we are currently dealing with implementation issues for the remaining content that we will add. We will get the completed version as soon as possible.
